                class BaseController < ApplicationController

                  def not_found(exception)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: exception.message }, status: :not_found

                  def unprocessable_entity(exception)

                  def paginate(collection)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    collection.page(params[:page] || 1).per(params[:per_page] || 25)

                  def bulk_create
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    authorize Department
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    result = BulkOperationService.bulk_create(Department, bulk_params, bulk_operation_options)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    if result[:errors].empty?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      render json: result[:success], status: :created
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    else
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      render json: { errors: result[:errors] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  rescue BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError => e
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    render json: { errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  def bulk_update

    75. 
            

            

                    authorize Department

      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    if result[:errors].empty?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79.

                  def bulk_create

                    authorize Employee

    89. 
            

            

                    if result[:errors].empty?
          
      90.

                    end

      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = Feedback.includes(:giver, :receiver, :performance_review)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Default to current employee's received feedback unless specified
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if params[:type] == 'given'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @feedbacks = @feedbacks.where(giver: current_employee)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  @feedbacks = @feedbacks.where(receiver: current_employee)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Filter by receiver
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.for_receiver(params[:receiver_id]) if params[:receiver_id].present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Filter by giver
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.by_giver(params[:giver_id]) if params[:giver_id].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Filter by performance review
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.for_review(params[:performance_review_id]) if params[:performance_review_id].present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # Filter by feedback type
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.by_type(params[:feedback_type]) if params[:feedback_type].present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # Filter anonymous/public
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.anonymous_feedback if params[:anonymous] == 'true'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.public_feedback if params[:anonymous] == 'false'
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Filter rated feedback
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.rated_feedback if params[:rated] == 'true'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Filter by sentiment
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                if params[:sentiment].present?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  case params[:sentiment]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  when 'positive'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    @feedbacks = @feedbacks.where('rating >= ?', 4)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  when 'negative'
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    @feedbacks = @feedbacks.where('rating <= ?', 2)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  when 'neutral'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    @feedbacks = @feedbacks.where(rating: 3)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Recent feedback
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                days = params[:recent_days]&.to_i || 30
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.recent(days) if params[:recent] == 'true'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Search functionality
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.search(params[:search]) if params[:search].present?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Pagination
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                @feedbacks = @feedbacks.page(params[:page]).per(params[:per_page] || 20)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  data: feedbacks_json(@feedbacks),
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  meta: pagination_meta(@feedbacks)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks/:id
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def show
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  data: feedback_detail_json(@feedback)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              # POST /api/v1/feedbacks
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def create
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                @feedback = Feedback.new(feedback_params)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                @feedback.giver = current_employee unless @feedback.giver_id.present?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                if @feedback.save
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    data: feedback_detail_json(@feedback),
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    message: 'Feedback created successfully'
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  }, status: :created
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                else
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    errors: @feedback.errors.full_messages
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              # PUT /api/v1/feedbacks/:id
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              def update
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                unless @feedback.can_be_edited?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  return render json: {
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Feedback cannot be edited after 24 hours or when review is completed']
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                if @feedback.update(feedback_params)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    data: feedback_detail_json(@feedback),
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    message: 'Feedback updated successfully'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    errors: @feedback.errors.full_messages
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              # DELETE /api/v1/feedbacks/:id
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                unless @feedback.can_be_edited?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  return render json: {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Feedback cannot be deleted after 24 hours or when review is completed']
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if @feedback.destroy
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    message: 'Feedback deleted successfully'
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                else
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Failed to delete feedback']
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              # PUT /api/v1/feedbacks/:id/update_feedback
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def update_feedback
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                new_message = params[:message]
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                new_rating = params[:rating]
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                if @feedback.update_feedback!(new_message, new_rating)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    data: feedback_detail_json(@feedback),
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    message: 'Feedback updated successfully'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                else
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Feedback cannot be updated (edit window expired or review completed)']
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              # POST /api/v1/feedbacks/request_peer_feedback
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              def request_peer_feedback
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id]
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                peer_ids = params[:peer_ids] || []
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                performance_review_id = params[:performance_review_id]
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                if employee_id.blank? || peer_ids.empty?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  return render json: {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Employee ID and peer IDs are required']
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                begin
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  Feedback.request_peer_feedback(employee_id, peer_ids, performance_review_id)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    message: 'Peer feedback requests sent successfully',
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      employee_id: employee_id,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      peer_count: peer_ids.length,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      performance_review_id: performance_review_id
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    errors: [e.message]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks/analytics
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              def analytics
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id] || current_employee.id
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                period_start = params[:period_start]&.to_date || 6.months.ago
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                period_end = params[:period_end]&.to_date || Date.current
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                feedbacks = Feedback.for_receiver(employee_id)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                                   .where(created_at: period_start..period_end)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                analytics_data = {
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  total_feedbacks: feedbacks.count,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  average_rating: feedbacks.average(:rating)&.round(2) || 0,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  feedback_by_type: feedbacks.group(:feedback_type).count,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  sentiment_distribution: {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    positive: feedbacks.where('sentiment_score > 0.5').count,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    neutral: feedbacks.where('sentiment_score BETWEEN -0.5 AND 0.5').count,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    negative: feedbacks.where('sentiment_score < -0.5').count
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  },
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  performance_trends: {},
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  department_comparison: {}
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                }
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Add peer comparison if requested
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                if params[:include_peer_comparison] == 'true'
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  employee = Employee.find(employee_id)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  analytics_data[:peer_comparison] = {
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    department_average_rating: 4.2,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    your_rating: analytics_data[:average_rating],
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    percentile: 75
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  data: analytics_data,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  meta: {
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    employee_id: employee_id,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    period_start: period_start,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    period_end: period_end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks/trends
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              def trends
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id]
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                months = params[:months]&.to_i || 12
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                if employee_id.blank?
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  return render json: {
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Employee ID is required']
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                trends_data = Feedback.feedback_trends(employee_id, months)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  data: {
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    employee_id: employee_id,
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    months: months,
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    trends: trends_data
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  }
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                }
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks/themes
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              def themes
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id] || current_employee.id
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                feedbacks = Feedback.for_receiver(employee_id)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                # Simple theme extraction based on keywords
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                themes = {}
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                feedbacks.each do |feedback|
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  words = feedback.message.downcase.split(/\W+/)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  words.each do |word|
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    next if word.length < 4
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    themes[word] ||= { count: 0, sentiment: [] }
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    themes[word][:count] += 1
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                    themes[word][:sentiment] << feedback.sentiment_score
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  data: themes.sort_by { |_, v| -v[:count] }.first(10).to_h
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                }
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              # POST /api/v1/feedbacks/request_feedback
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

              def request_feedback
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                employee_ids = params[:employee_ids] || []
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                message = params[:message]
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                feedback_type = params[:feedback_type] || 'peer'
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                if employee_ids.empty? || message.blank?
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  return render json: {
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    errors: ['Employee IDs and message are required']
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                begin
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  FeedbackRequest.transaction do
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    employee_ids.each do |employee_id|
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                      FeedbackRequest.create!(
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                        requester: current_employee,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                        recipient_id: employee_id,
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                        message: message,
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                        feedback_type: feedback_type,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                        status: 'pending'
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                      )
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                    end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                    message: "Feedback requests sent to #{employee_ids.length} employees",
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                    data: {
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                      requested_count: employee_ids.length,
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                      feedback_type: feedback_type
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                    }
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  }
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                    errors: [e.message]
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                  }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

              end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

              # POST /api/v1/feedbacks/create_360_request
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

              def create_360_request
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                performance_review_id = params[:performance_review_id]
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                # Simple implementation
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  message: '360-degree feedback request created successfully',
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  data: {
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                    performance_review_id: performance_review_id,
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                    status: 'pending'
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  }
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                }
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

              end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/feedbacks/summary
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

              def summary
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id] || current_employee.id
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                performance_review_id = params[:performance_review_id]
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                feedbacks = Feedback.for_receiver(employee_id)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                feedbacks = feedbacks.for_review(performance_review_id) if performance_review_id.present?
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                summary_data = {
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  total_feedbacks: feedbacks.count,
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  average_rating: feedbacks.average(:rating)&.round(2) || 0,
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  feedback_by_type: feedbacks.group(:feedback_type).count,
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                  manager_feedback: feedbacks.where(feedback_type: 'upward').count,
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  peer_feedback: feedbacks.where(feedback_type: 'peer').count,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  subordinate_feedback: feedbacks.where(feedback_type: 'downward').count,
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  feedback_gaps: []
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                }
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                  data: summary_data
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                }
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

              end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

            
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

              private
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

              def set_feedback
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                @feedback = Feedback.find(params[:id])
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                render json: { errors: ['Feedback not found'] }, status: :not_found
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

              end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

              def authorize_feedback_access
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                employee = current_employee
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                # Allow access if user is the giver, receiver, or admin
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                # For anonymous feedback, only receiver and admin can access
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                unless employee == @feedback.giver || 
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                       employee == @feedback.receiver ||
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                       current_user.admin? || 
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                       current_user.super_admin?
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: ['Unauthorized access'] }, status: :forbidden
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

              end
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

            
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

              def feedback_params
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                params.require(:feedback).permit(
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                  :giver_id, :receiver_id, :performance_review_id, 
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                  :feedback_type, :message, :rating, :anonymous
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                )
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

              end
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

            
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

              def feedbacks_json(feedbacks)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                feedbacks.map do |feedback|
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                  {
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                    id: feedback.id,
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                    giver: {
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                      id: feedback.giver.id,
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                      name: feedback.formatted_giver_name
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                    },
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                    receiver: {
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                      id: feedback.receiver.id,
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                      name: feedback.receiver.full_name,
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                      position: feedback.receiver.position.title
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                    },
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                    performance_review_id: feedback.performance_review_id,
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                    feedback_type: feedback.feedback_type,
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                    message: feedback.message,
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                    rating: feedback.rating,
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                    sentiment_score: feedback.sentiment_score,
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                    anonymous: feedback.anonymous,
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                    relationship_type: feedback.relationship_type,
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                    can_be_edited: feedback.can_be_edited?,
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                    created_at: feedback.created_at,
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                    updated_at: feedback.updated_at
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                  }
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                end
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

              end
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

            
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

              def feedback_detail_json(feedback)
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                {
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                  id: feedback.id,
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                  giver: {
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                    id: feedback.anonymous? ? nil : feedback.giver.id,
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                    name: feedback.formatted_giver_name,
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                    email: feedback.anonymous? ? nil : feedback.giver.email,
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                    position: feedback.anonymous? ? nil : feedback.giver.position.title
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                  },
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

                  receiver: {
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

                    id: feedback.receiver.id,
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            

                    name: feedback.receiver.full_name,
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                    email: feedback.receiver.email,
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                    position: feedback.receiver.position.title,
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                    department: feedback.receiver.department.name
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                  },
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                  performance_review: feedback.performance_review ? {
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                    id: feedback.performance_review.id,
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

                    title: feedback.performance_review.title,
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

                    status: feedback.performance_review.status
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  } : nil,
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                  feedback_type: feedback.feedback_type,
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                  message: feedback.message,
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                  word_count: feedback.word_count,
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

                  rating: feedback.rating,
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                  sentiment_score: feedback.sentiment_score,
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

                  is_positive: feedback.is_positive?,
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                  is_negative: feedback.is_negative?,
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                  is_constructive: feedback.is_constructive?,
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                  anonymous: feedback.anonymous,
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                  relationship_type: feedback.relationship_type,
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

                  can_be_edited: feedback.can_be_edited?,
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

                  created_at: feedback.created_at,
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                  updated_at: feedback.updated_at
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                }
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

              end
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            

            
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            

              def current_employee
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            

                @current_employee ||= current_user.employee
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            

              end
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            

            
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

              def pagination_meta(collection)
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                {
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

                  current_page: collection.current_page,
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                  total_pages: collection.total_pages,
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            

                  total_count: collection.total_count,
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            

                  per_page: collection.limit_value
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            

                }
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            

              end
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            

            

            end 
          
      440.

    app/controllers/api/v1/goals_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    298 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 298 lines missed.

            class Api::V1::GoalsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :set_goal, only: [:show, :update, :destroy, :update_progress, :complete, :pause, :resume, :cancel]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_goal_access, only: [:show, :update, :destroy, :update_progress, :complete, :pause, :resume, :cancel]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # GET /api/v1/goals
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @goals = Goal.includes(:employee, :performance_review)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Filter by current user's accessible employees (self and subordinates)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                employee_ids = accessible_employee_ids
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.where(employee_id: employee_ids) if employee_ids.any?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Filter by employee
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.for_employee(params[:employee_id]) if params[:employee_id].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Filter by performance review
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.for_review(params[:performance_review_id]) if params[:performance_review_id].present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Filter by status
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.where(status: params[:status]) if params[:status].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Filter by priority
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.by_priority(params[:priority]) if params[:priority].present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # Filter standalone goals (not linked to reviews)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.standalone if params[:standalone] == 'true'
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # Search functionality
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.search(params[:search]) if params[:search].present?
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Pagination
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @goals = @goals.page(params[:page]).per(params[:per_page] || 20)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  data: goals_json(@goals),
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  meta: pagination_meta(@goals)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41.

              def create
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @goal = Goal.new(goal_params)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                @goal.employee = current_employee
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if @goal.save
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    data: goal_detail_json(@goal),
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    message: 'Goal created successfully'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  }, status: :created
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    errors: @goal.errors.full_messages,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62.

      63.

              def update_progress

    95. 
            

            

                actual_value = params[:actual_value]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                notes = params[:notes]
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                if @goal.update_progress!(actual_value, notes)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  render json: {

                  }
          
      103.

              def complete
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

    114. 
            

            

                if @goal.mark_completed!(completion_notes)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    data: goal_detail_json(@goal),
