              # GET /api/v1/performance_reviews
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              5
            

            

                @performance_reviews = PerformanceReview.includes(:employee, :reviewer, :goals, :feedbacks, :ratings)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Filter by current user's accessible employees (self and subordinates)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              5
            

            

                employee_ids = accessible_employee_ids
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              5
            

            

                @performance_reviews = @performance_reviews.where(employee_id: employee_ids) if employee_ids.any?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Filter by employee if specified

    15.

      16.

      17.

      28.

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32.

              def create

              def summary
          
      153.

              # GET /api/v1/performance_reviews/analytics
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              1
            

            

              def analytics
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              3
            

            

                employee_id = params[:employee_id]
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              3
            

            

                include_benchmarks = params[:include_benchmarks] == 'true'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
              3
            

            

                if employee_id.blank?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: ['Employee ID is required'] }, status: :bad_request
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  return
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              3
            

            

                reviews = PerformanceReview.where(employee_id: employee_id)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                analytics_data = {
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              3
            

            

                  total_reviews: reviews.count,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  completed_reviews: reviews.where(status: 'completed').count,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  average_score: reviews.joins(:ratings).average('ratings.score')&.round(2) || 0,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  review_history: reviews.order(:created_at).limit(10).map do |review|
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    {
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              4
            

            

                      id: review.id,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      title: review.title,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      status: review.status,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      created_at: review.created_at
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183.

              def current_employee

              def accessible_employee_ids

              def performance_review_summary_json(review)

                {

      315.

      325.

                class PermissionsController < BaseController

    4. 
            

            

                  before_action :set_user
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5.

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    authorize @user, :manage_permissions?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    @permissions = policy_scope(@user.permissions)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    @permissions = @permissions.where(resource: params[:resource]) if params[:resource].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    render json: @permissions
          
      12.

      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

                  def show

      18.

                  def create
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    authorize @user, :manage_permissions?

    21. 
            

            

                    @permission = @user.permissions.build(permission_params)

    22. 
            

            

                    
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

    25.

    27.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

                  def update

                  def destroy
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    authorize @user, :manage_permissions?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    @permission.destroy
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    head :no_content
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  def bulk_create
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    authorize Permission
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    result = BulkOperationService.bulk_create(Permission, bulk_create_params, batch_size: params[:batch_size])
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    if result[:errors].empty?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      render json: result[:success], status: :created
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    else
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      render json: { errors: result[:errors] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  rescue BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError => e
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    render json: { errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  private
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  def set_user
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    @user = User.find(params[:user_id])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: 'User not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  def set_permission
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    @permission = @user.permissions.find(params[:id])
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: 'Permission not found' }, status: :not_found
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  def permission_params
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    params.require(:permission).permit(:resource, :action, :resource_id)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  def bulk_create_params
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    params.require(:permissions).map do |permission_params|
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      permission_params.permit(:resource, :action, :resource_id).merge(user_id: params[:user_id])
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end

    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82.

            end

                  def bulk_create
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    authorize Position
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    result = BulkOperationService.bulk_create(Position, bulk_create_params, batch_size: params[:batch_size])
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    if result[:errors].empty?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      render json: result[:success], status: :created
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    else
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      render json: { errors: result[:errors] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  rescue BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError => e
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    render json: { errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      86.

                  end

                  def sign_in
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    user = User.find_by(email: params[:email])
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    if user&.valid_password?(params[:password])
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      token = JsonWebToken.encode(user_id: user.id)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      render json: { token: token }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: 'Invalid email or password' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  def sign_up
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    user = User.new(sign_up_params)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    if user.save
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      token = JsonWebToken.encode(user_id: user.id)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      render json: { token: token }, status: :created
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      render json: { errors: user.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  def sign_out
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    authorize current_user, :sign_out?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    current_user.update(jti: SecureRandom.uuid)

              def ancestors

                return [] unless parent_department

              def self.cached_tree

              def no_circular_hierarchy
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              98
            

            

                return unless parent_department_id_changed? && parent_department_id.present?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                visited = Set.new
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                current = parent_department_id
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                while current.present?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  if current == id || visited.include?(current)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:parent_department_id, 'circular hierarchy is not allowed')
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    break
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  visited.add(current)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  current = Department.find_by(id: current)&.parent_department_id
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              1
            

            

              def manager_must_belong_to_department
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
              98
            

            

                if manager && !employees.include?(manager)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:manager, 'must be an employee of the department')
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              1
            

            

              def invalidate_tree_cache
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              98
            

            

                CacheService.delete('departments:tree')
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              1
            

            

              def invalidate_org_chart_cache
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              98
            

            

                CacheService.delete_matched('departments:org_chart:*')
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
              98
            

            

                ancestors.each { |dept| CacheService.delete(["departments:org_chart", dept.id]) }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              1

    123. 
            
              98
            

            

                CacheService.invalidate_department_caches(self)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            end

                performance_reviews.completed_in_period(months.months.ago, Date.current)

              def goal_completion_rate
          
      91.

                total_goals = goals.count

              def manager_position_level_check

              def no_circular_management
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              163
            

            

                return unless manager_id_changed? && manager_id.present?

                visited = Set.new

                current = manager_id

    135. 
            
              65
            

            

                  if visited.include?(current)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:manager_id, 'circular management is not allowed')
          
      137.

      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138.

      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              65

      142.

              def is_positive?

              def relationship_type
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                return 'self' if giver == receiver

              # 360° Feedback Analytics
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.feedback_summary_for_employee(employee_id, period_start = nil, period_end = nil)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                scope = for_receiver(employee_id)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                scope = scope.where(created_at: period_start..period_end) if period_start && period_end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                {
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  total_feedback_count: scope.count,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  by_type: scope.group(:feedback_type).count,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  average_rating: scope.rated_feedback.average(:rating)&.round(2) || 0,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  rating_distribution: scope.rated_feedback.group(:rating).count,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  anonymous_count: scope.anonymous_feedback.count,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  public_count: scope.public_feedback.count,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  sentiment_breakdown: scope.rated_feedback.group_by(&:sentiment_score).transform_values(&:count)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                }
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.peer_comparison_analysis(employee_id, department_id = nil)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                employee = Employee.find(employee_id)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                department_id ||= employee.department.id
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                peer_employees = Employee.joins(:position)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                                        .where(positions: { department_id: department_id })
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                                        .where.not(id: employee_id)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                employee_avg = for_receiver(employee_id).rated_feedback.average(:rating) || 0
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                peer_averages = peer_employees.map do |peer|
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    employee: peer,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    average_rating: for_receiver(peer.id).rated_feedback.average(:rating) || 0
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                department_avg = peer_averages.sum { |p| p[:average_rating] } / peer_averages.length
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  employee_average: employee_avg.round(2),
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  department_average: department_avg.round(2),
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  peer_rankings: peer_averages.sort_by { |p| -p[:average_rating] },
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  percentile: calculate_percentile(employee_avg, peer_averages.map { |p| p[:average_rating] })
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.feedback_trends(employee_id, months = 12)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                start_date = months.months.ago
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                monthly_data = for_receiver(employee_id)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                               .where('created_at >= ?', start_date)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                               .group("DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at)")
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                               .group(:feedback_type)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                               .average(:rating)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                monthly_data.map do |key, avg_rating|
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  date, feedback_type = key
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    month: date.strftime('%Y-%m'),
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    feedback_type: feedback_type,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    average_rating: avg_rating.round(2)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              # Search functionality
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.search(query)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                return all if query.blank?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                joins(:giver, :receiver)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  .where(
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    "feedbacks.message ILIKE ? OR givers_feedbacks.first_name ILIKE ? OR givers_feedbacks.last_name ILIKE ?",
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  )
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              1
            

            

              def giver_not_same_as_receiver
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                if giver_id == receiver_id && !feedback_type_self_evaluation?
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:giver, 'cannot be the same as receiver unless self-evaluation')
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            

              def feedback_relationship_valid
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                return unless giver && receiver
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                case feedback_type
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                when 'manager'
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  unless giver == receiver.manager || giver.user.admin? || giver.user.super_admin?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:feedback_type, 'manager feedback must come from actual manager or admin')
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                when 'subordinate'
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  unless receiver == giver.manager
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:feedback_type, 'subordinate feedback must go to actual manager')
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                when 'peer'
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  if giver == receiver.manager || receiver == giver.manager
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:feedback_type, 'peer feedback should not be between manager and subordinate')
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self_evaluation_consistency
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                if feedback_type_self_evaluation? && giver_id != receiver_id
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:feedback_type, 'self-evaluation must have same giver and receiver')
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
              1
            

            

              def notify_participants

                # TODO: Implement notification system

      222.

      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              1
            

            

              def invalidate_caches
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                CacheService.invalidate_feedback_caches(receiver_id, giver_id)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.calculate_percentile(score, scores_array)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                return 0 if scores_array.empty?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                sorted_scores = scores_array.sort
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                below_count = sorted_scores.count { |s| s < score }
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                (below_count.to_f / sorted_scores.length * 100).round(2)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            end 
          
      236.

              # Business Methods

              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                return 0 if target_value.zero?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                percentage = (actual_value / target_value * 100).round(2)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                [percentage, 100].min # Cap at 100%
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              1
            

            

              alias_method :progress_percentage, :completion_percentage
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_overdue?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                due_date < Date.current && status_active?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            

              def days_until_due
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                (due_date - Date.current).to_i
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
              1
            

            

              alias_method :days_remaining, :days_until_due
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              1
            

            

              def days_overdue
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                return 0 unless is_overdue?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                (Date.current - due_date).to_i
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            

              def progress_status
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                return 'completed' if status_completed?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                return 'overdue' if is_overdue?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                return 'on_track' if completion_percentage >= expected_progress_percentage
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                return 'behind_schedule'
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              1
            

            

              def expected_progress_percentage
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                return 0 if due_date <= created_at.to_date
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                total_days = (due_date - created_at.to_date).to_i
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                elapsed_days = (Date.current - created_at.to_date).to_i
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                return 100 if elapsed_days >= total_days
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                return 0 if elapsed_days <= 0
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                (elapsed_days.to_f / total_days * 100).round(2)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_progress!(new_actual_value, notes = nil)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                return false if status_completed? || status_cancelled?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  self.actual_value = new_actual_value
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  self.description = [description, "Progress Update: #{notes}"].compact.join("\n\n") if notes.present?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  if actual_value >= target_value
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    self.status = :completed
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    self.completed_at = Time.current
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  save!
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                true
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid

    113.

              def mark_completed!(completion_notes = nil)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                return false unless status_active?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  update!(
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    status: :completed,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    actual_value: target_value,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    completed_at: Time.current,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    description: [description, "Completed: #{completion_notes}"].compact.join("\n\n")
          
      125.

                  )

              def pause!(reason = nil)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                return false unless status_active?
          
      132.

                transaction do

              # SMART Goal validation
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_smart_goal?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  specific: title.present? && description.present?,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  measurable: target_value.present? && target_value > 0,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  achievable: target_value <= (actual_value * 5), # Reasonable multiplier
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  relevant: employee.present?,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  time_bound: due_date.present? && due_date > Date.current
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                }
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              1
            

            

              def smart_score
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                smart_criteria = is_smart_goal?
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                achieved_criteria = smart_criteria.values.count(true)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                (achieved_criteria.to_f / smart_criteria.length * 100).round(2)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              # Search functionality
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.search(query)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                return all if query.blank?
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                joins(:employee)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  .where(
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    "goals.title ILIKE ? OR goals.description ILIKE ? OR employees.first_name ILIKE ? OR employees.last_name ILIKE ?",
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%"
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  )
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              # Bulk operations
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.bulk_update_progress(goal_updates)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  goal_updates.each do |goal_id, progress_data|
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    goal = find(goal_id)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    goal.update_progress!(progress_data[:actual_value], progress_data[:notes])
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              1
            

            

              def smart_compliant?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                # SMART criteria: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                specific = title.present? && title.length > 10
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                measurable = target_value.present? && target_value > 0
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                achievable = target_value.present? && target_value <= 1000000 # Reasonable upper limit
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                relevant = employee.present?
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                time_bound = due_date.present? && due_date > Date.current
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                specific && measurable && achievable && relevant && time_bound
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
              1
            

            

              def smart_violations
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                violations = []
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                violations << "Title must be specific (at least 10 characters)" unless title.present? && title.length > 10
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                violations << "Target value must be measurable (greater than 0)" unless target_value.present? && target_value > 0
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                violations << "Target value must be achievable (reasonable limit)" unless target_value.present? && target_value <= 1000000
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                violations << "Goal must be relevant (employee must be assigned)" unless employee.present?
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                violations << "Goal must be time-bound (due date in future)" unless due_date.present? && due_date > Date.current
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                violations
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              1
            

            

              def due_date_in_future
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              5
            

            

                return unless due_date
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              5
            

            

                return if persisted? # Skip validation for existing records
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
              5
            

            

                if due_date <= Date.current
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:due_date, 'must be in the future')
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
              1
            

            

              def target_value_greater_than_actual
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              5
            

            

                return unless target_value && actual_value
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
              5
            

            

                if actual_value > target_value
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:actual_value, 'cannot exceed target value')
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_completion_status
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              5
            

            

                if actual_value_changed? && actual_value >= target_value && status_active?
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  self.status = :completed
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              1
            

            

              def set_completed_at
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
              3
            

            

                if status_completed? && completed_at.blank?
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  self.completed_at = Time.current
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              3
            

            

                elsif !status_completed? && completed_at.present?
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  self.completed_at = nil
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_overdue_status
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                if is_overdue? && status_active?
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  update_column(:status, :overdue)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

              end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              1
            

            

              def invalidate_caches
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
              5
            

            

                CacheService.invalidate_goal_caches(employee_id)
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            end 
          
      270.

    app/models/jwt_denylist.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    3 relevant lines. 3 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
              1
            

            

            class JwtDenylist < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1

            class Kpi < ApplicationRecord

              include Cacheable

              # Associations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              belongs_to :employee

    6. 
            

            

              belongs_to :position, optional: true

              enum status: {

    11. 
            

            

                active: 0,

    12. 
            

            

                completed: 1,

    13. 
            

            

                cancelled: 2,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                archived: 3

              }, _prefix: true

              enum measurement_unit: {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                number: 'number',

              enum measurement_period: {
          
      28.

                daily: 'daily',

                weekly: 'weekly',

              # Validations
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              validates :name, presence: true, length: { minimum: 3, maximum: 100 }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              validates :description, presence: true, length: { minimum: 10, maximum: 500 }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              validates :target_value, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              validates :actual_value, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              validates :period_start, :period_end, presence: true
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              validates :measurement_unit, presence: true
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              validate :period_end_after_start
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              validate :target_value_reasonable_for_unit
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # Soft delete
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48.

              # Scopes
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              scope :active_kpis, -> { where(status: :active) }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              scope :completed_kpis, -> { where(status: :completed) }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              scope :for_employee, ->(employee_id) { where(employee_id: employee_id) }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              scope :for_position, ->(position_id) { where(position_id: position_id) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              scope :current_period, -> { where('period_start <= ? AND period_end >= ?', Date.current, Date.current) }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              scope :in_period, ->(start_date, end_date) { where('period_start <= ? AND period_end >= ?', end_date, start_date) }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              scope :by_measurement_unit, ->(unit) { where(measurement_unit: unit) }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              scope :underperforming, -> { where('(actual_value / target_value) < 0.8') }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              scope :overperforming, -> { where('(actual_value / target_value) > 1.2') }
          
      58.
