              def achievement_percentage
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                return 0 if target_value.nil? || target_value.zero?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                ((actual_value || 0).to_f / target_value * 100).round(2)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def achievement_status
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                percentage = achievement_percentage
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                case percentage
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                when 0...50
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  'poor'
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                when 50...80

              end
          
      86.

      87.

              def is_overdue?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                period_end < Date.current && !status_completed?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def days_until_period_end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                (period_end - Date.current).to_i
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95.

              def period_duration_days
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                (period_end - period_start).to_i
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def elapsed_period_percentage
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                return 100 if period_end <= Date.current
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                return 0 if period_start > Date.current
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                total_days = period_duration_days
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                elapsed_days = (Date.current - period_start).to_i
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                (elapsed_days.to_f / total_days * 100).round(2)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              def expected_progress
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                return target_value if period_end <= Date.current
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                return 0 if period_start > Date.current
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                (target_value * elapsed_period_percentage / 100).round(2)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def progress_variance
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                (actual_value - expected_progress).round(2)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              def is_on_track?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                progress_variance >= -(target_value * 0.1) # Within 10% of expected
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              def formatted_value
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                case measurement_unit
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                when 'percentage'
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  "#{actual_value}%"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                when 'currency'
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  "$#{actual_value}"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                when 'hours'
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  "#{actual_value}h"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                when 'days'
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  "#{actual_value} days"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  actual_value.to_s
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              def formatted_target

      153.

              def formatted_actual
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                case measurement_unit

    156.

              def update_progress!(new_actual_value, notes = nil)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                return false if status_completed? || status_cancelled?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  self.actual_value = new_actual_value
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  self.description = [description, "Progress Update: #{notes}"].compact.join("\n\n") if notes.present?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  # Auto-complete if target reached and period ended
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  if actual_value >= target_value && period_end <= Date.current
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    self.status = :completed
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  save!
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                true
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                false
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              def complete!(completion_notes = nil)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                return false unless can_be_completed?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  update!(
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    status: :completed,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    description: [description, "Completed: #{completion_notes}"].compact.join("\n\n")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  )
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                true
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def archive!(reason = nil)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                return false if status_archived?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  update!(
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    status: :archived,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    description: [description, "Archived: #{reason}"].compact.join("\n\n")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  )
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                true
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              def can_be_completed?
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                status_active? && (achievement_percentage >= 100 || period_end <= Date.current)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              def trend_direction
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # Simple trend based on progress variance
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                if progress_variance > (target_value * 0.1)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  :up
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                elsif progress_variance < -(target_value * 0.1)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  :down
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                else
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  :stable
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

              # Analytics Methods
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              def self.department_performance_summary(department_id, period_start, period_end)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                employee_ids = Employee.joins(:position).where(positions: { department_id: department_id }).pluck(:id)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                kpis = in_period(period_start, period_end).where(employee_id: employee_ids)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                {
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  total_kpis: kpis.count,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  completed_kpis: kpis.completed_kpis.count,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  average_achievement: kpis.average('actual_value / target_value * 100')&.round(2) || 0,
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  underperforming_count: kpis.underperforming.count,
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  overperforming_count: kpis.overperforming.count
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                }
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              def self.position_benchmarks(position_id, measurement_unit)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                where(position_id: position_id, measurement_unit: measurement_unit)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  .group(:name)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  .average('actual_value / target_value * 100')
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247.

              def self.trending_analysis(employee_id, kpi_name, months = 6)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                start_date = months.months.ago
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                kpis = where(employee_id: employee_id, name: kpi_name)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                       .where('period_start >= ?', start_date)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                       .order(:period_start)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                kpis.map do |kpi|
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  {
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    period: "#{kpi.period_start.strftime('%b %Y')}",
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    achievement_percentage: kpi.achievement_percentage,
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    actual_value: kpi.actual_value,
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    target_value: kpi.target_value
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  }
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

              end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265.

              # Search functionality

              def self.search(query)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                return all if query.blank?
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                joins(:employee)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  .where(
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    "kpis.name ILIKE ? OR kpis.description ILIKE ? OR employees.first_name ILIKE ? OR employees.last_name ILIKE ?",
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%", "%#{query}%"
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  )
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274.

              def self.bulk_create_for_position(position_id, kpi_templates)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                employee_ids = Employee.where(position_id: position_id).pluck(:id)

    279. 
            

            

                
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  employee_ids.each do |employee_id|
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                    kpi_templates.each do |template|
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                      create!(
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                        employee_id: employee_id,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                        position_id: position_id,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286.

      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                        description: template[:description],
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288.

      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291.

      292.

                      )

                    end

                end

              private

              def period_end_after_start
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                return unless period_start && period_end
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                if period_end <= period_start
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:period_end, 'must be after period start')
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

            
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

              def target_value_reasonable_for_unit
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                return unless target_value && measurement_unit
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                case measurement_unit
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                when 'percentage'
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  if target_value > 100
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:target_value, 'cannot exceed 100 for percentage')
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  end
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                when 'ratio'
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  if target_value > 10
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:target_value, 'ratio should typically be under 10')
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                  end
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                end
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

              end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

              def update_completion_status
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                if period_end_changed? && period_end <= Date.current && achievement_percentage >= 100
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  self.status = :completed
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                end
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

              end
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

              def invalidate_caches

    330. 
            

            

                CacheService.invalidate_kpi_caches(employee_id, position_id)
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

              end
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

            end

            class PerformanceReview < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              include Cacheable
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Associations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :employee
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :reviewer, class_name: 'Employee'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

              has_many :goals, dependent: :destroy

              enum status: {
          
      13.

                draft: 0,
          
      14.

                in_progress: 1,

                completed: 2,

              # Validations

              validates :title, presence: true, length: { minimum: 3, maximum: 100 }

              # Scopes

    39.

              scope :active, -> { where(status: [:draft, :in_progress]) }

              scope :completed_in_period, ->(start_date, end_date) {

              scope :overdue, -> { where('end_date < ? AND status IN (?)', Date.current, [0, 1]) }

              # Business Methods
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              1
            

            

              def overall_score
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              22
            

            

                return 0 if ratings.empty?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                total_weighted_score = ratings.sum { |rating| rating.score * rating.weight }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                total_weight = ratings.sum(&:weight)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_weight.zero?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                (total_weighted_score / total_weight).round(2)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              22
            

            

                return 0 if goals.empty?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                completed_goals = goals.where(status: :completed).count
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                (completed_goals.to_f / goals.count * 100).round(2)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              1
            

            

              def feedback_summary
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
              8
            

            

                  total_count: feedbacks.count,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  by_type: feedbacks.group(:feedback_type).count,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  average_rating: feedbacks.where.not(rating: nil).average(:rating)&.round(2) || 0
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76.

      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_overdue?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              22
            

            

                end_date < Date.current && !status_completed?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            

              def days_until_due

                (end_date - Date.current).to_i

    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84.

      85.

              1
            

            

              def can_be_completed?

                status_in_progress? && goals.where(status: :active).empty?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89.

              1
            

            

              def submit_for_review!
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              3
            

            

                return false unless status_draft?

              def hierarchy

              def no_circular_hierarchy
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              102
            

            

                return unless parent_position_id_changed? && parent_position_id.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                visited = Set.new
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                current = parent_position_id
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                while current.present?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  if visited.include?(current)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:parent_position_id, 'circular hierarchy is not allowed')
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    break
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  visited.add(current)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  current = Position.find_by(id: current)&.parent_position_id
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78.

      79.

              1
            

            

              def parent_position_level_check
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              102
            

            

                return unless parent_position && level

    81. 
            

            

                unless level < parent_position.level
          
      82.

      83.

    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :performance_review
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :competency_name, presence: true, length: { minimum: 2, maximum: 100 }
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :score, presence: true, inclusion: { in: 1..5 }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :weight, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than: 0, less_than_or_equal_to: 5 }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :competency_name, uniqueness: { scope: :performance_review_id }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Soft delete
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              1
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # Scopes
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :for_review, ->(review_id) { where(performance_review_id: review_id) }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :by_competency, ->(competency) { where(competency_name: competency) }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :high_scores, -> { where('score >= ?', 4) }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :low_scores, -> { where('score <= ?', 2) }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :by_score, ->(score) { where(score: score) }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :weighted_average, -> { select('AVG(score * weight) / AVG(weight) as weighted_avg') }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Callbacks
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              1
            

            

              after_commit :invalidate_caches
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              1
            

            

              after_touch :invalidate_caches
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              1
            

            

              after_save :update_review_completion
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # Business Methods
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              1
            

            

              def weighted_score
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                (score * weight).round(2)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              1
            

            

              def score_label
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                case score
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                when 1
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  'Poor'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                when 2
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  'Below Expectation'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                when 3
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  'Meets Expectation'
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                when 4
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  'Exceeds Expectation'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                when 5
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  'Outstanding'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              1
            

            

              def performance_level
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                case score
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                when 1..2
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  'needs_improvement'
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                when 3
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  'satisfactory'
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                when 4..5
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  'excellent'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_strength?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                score >= 4
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            

              def is_development_area?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                score <= 2
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
              1
            

            

              def weight_percentage(total_weight)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_weight.zero?
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                (weight / total_weight * 100).round(2)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # Class methods for analytics
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.competency_averages_for_review(review_id)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                for_review(review_id)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  .group(:competency_name)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  .average(:score)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  .transform_values { |avg| avg.round(2) }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.weighted_average_for_review(review_id)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                ratings = for_review(review_id)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return 0 if ratings.empty?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                total_weighted_score = ratings.sum { |r| r.score * r.weight }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                total_weight = ratings.sum(&:weight)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_weight.zero?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                (total_weighted_score / total_weight).round(2)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.competency_benchmarks(competency_name, department_id = nil)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                query = joins(performance_review: { employee: :position })
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                        .where(competency_name: competency_name)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                if department_id
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  query = query.where(positions: { department_id: department_id })
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  average_score: query.average(:score)&.round(2) || 0,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  score_distribution: query.group(:score).count,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  total_ratings: query.count,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  top_performers: query.high_scores.count,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  development_needed: query.low_scores.count
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.employee_competency_profile(employee_id, months = 12)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                start_date = months.months.ago
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                joins(:performance_review)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  .where(performance_reviews: { employee_id: employee_id })
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  .where('performance_reviews.created_at >= ?', start_date)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  .group(:competency_name)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  .average(:score)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  .transform_values { |avg| avg.round(2) }
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  .sort_by { |_, score| -score }
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.trending_competencies(department_id = nil, months = 6)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                start_date = months.months.ago
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                query = joins(performance_review: { employee: :position })
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        .where('performance_reviews.created_at >= ?', start_date)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                if department_id
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  query = query.where(positions: { department_id: department_id })
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                monthly_trends = query
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  .group(:competency_name)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  .group("DATE_TRUNC('month', performance_reviews.created_at)")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  .average(:score)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                # Group by competency and calculate trend
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                competency_trends = {}
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                monthly_trends.each do |(competency, month), avg_score|
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  competency_trends[competency] ||= []
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  competency_trends[competency] << {
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    month: month.strftime('%Y-%m'),
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    average_score: avg_score.round(2)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # Calculate trend direction for each competency
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                competency_trends.transform_values do |monthly_data|
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  sorted_data = monthly_data.sort_by { |d| d[:month] }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  trend_direction = if sorted_data.length > 1
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    first_score = sorted_data.first[:average_score]
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    last_score = sorted_data.last[:average_score]
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    if last_score > first_score + 0.2
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      'improving'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    elsif last_score < first_score - 0.2
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      'declining'
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    else
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      'stable'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  else
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    'insufficient_data'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    monthly_data: sorted_data,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    trend_direction: trend_direction,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    current_average: sorted_data.last&.dig(:average_score) || 0
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  }
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.department_competency_gaps(department_id, target_score = 3.5)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                employee_ids = Employee.joins(:position)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                                      .where(positions: { department_id: department_id })
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                                      .pluck(:id)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                competency_averages = joins(:performance_review)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                                     .where(performance_reviews: { employee_id: employee_ids })
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                                     .group(:competency_name)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                                     .average(:score)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                gaps = competency_averages.select { |_, avg| avg < target_score }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                                         .transform_values { |avg| (target_score - avg).round(2) }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                                         .sort_by { |_, gap| -gap }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  competency_gaps: gaps,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  total_competencies: competency_averages.count,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  gaps_count: gaps.count,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  department_average: competency_averages.values.sum / competency_averages.count
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                }
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              # Bulk operations
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.bulk_create_for_review(review_id, competency_ratings)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                transaction do
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  competency_ratings.each do |competency_data|
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    create!(
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      performance_review_id: review_id,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      competency_name: competency_data[:name],
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      score: competency_data[:score],
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      comments: competency_data[:comments],
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      weight: competency_data[:weight] || 1.0
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    )
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.standard_competencies
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                [
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  'Communication Skills',
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  'Leadership',
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  'Problem Solving',

                def resolve

      49.

    app/policies/concerns/permission_concern.rb

            module PermissionConcern
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def has_permission?(action)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                return true if user.super_admin?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                return true if user.admin? && ['read', 'update', 'create', 'delete'].include?(action)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                resource_name = record.class.name.downcase
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                user.has_permission?(action, resource_name, record.id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12.

              def has_read_permission?

    app/services/bulk_department_service.rb

    1. 
            

            

            class BulkDepartmentService < BulkOperationService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              BATCH_LIMIT = 50
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              REQUIRED_FIELDS = %w[name].freeze
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                def bulk_create(departments)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(departments, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  validate_presence!(departments, REQUIRED_FIELDS)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  validate_uniqueness!(departments, 'name')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(departments, 'parent_department_id', Department) if departments.any? { |d| d['parent_department_id'].present? }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(departments, 'manager_id', Employee) if departments.any? { |d| d['manager_id'].present? }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Manual creation with our validation
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  created_departments = []
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    departments.each do |department_params|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      department = Department.create!(department_params)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      created_departments << department
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20.

                  end

                  created_departments

                end
