                def bulk_update(departments)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(departments, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(departments, 'id', Department)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(departments, 'parent_department_id', Department) if departments.any? { |d| d['parent_department_id'].present? }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(departments, 'manager_id', Employee) if departments.any? { |d| d['manager_id'].present? }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Manual update with our validation
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  updated_departments = []
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    departments.each do |department_params|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      id = department_params['id'] || department_params[:id]
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      department = Department.find(id)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      update_params = department_params.except('id', :id)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      department.update!(update_params)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      updated_departments << department
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  updated_departments
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                def bulk_delete(department_ids)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(department_ids, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  departments = Department.where(id: department_ids)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  missing_ids = department_ids - departments.pluck(:id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  unless missing_ids.empty?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Some departments not found", { missing_ids: missing_ids })
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  process_in_transaction(departments) do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    departments.each do |department|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      if department.employees.exists?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new(
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                          "Cannot delete department with employees",
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                          { department_id: department.id }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        )
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      department.destroy!
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    departments.to_a
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                private
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                def process_in_transaction(records)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    yield records
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Validation failed", e.record.errors.full_messages)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            end 
          
      78.

                def bulk_create(params)

    7.

                def bulk_transfer(employee_ids, new_position_id)

                def validate_limit!(params)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Batch size exceeds limit of #{BATCH_LIMIT}") if params.size > BATCH_LIMIT
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                def validate_presence!(params, fields)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  missing_fields = params.each_with_object([]) do |param, acc|
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    missing = fields.select do |field|
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      value = param[field.to_s] || param[field.to_sym]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      value.blank?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    acc.concat(missing) if missing.any?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Missing required fields: #{missing_fields.uniq.join(', ')}") if missing_fields.any?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                def validate_uniqueness!(params, field)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  values = params.map { |p| p[field.to_s] || p[field.to_sym] }.compact
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  duplicates = values.select { |v| values.count(v) > 1 }.uniq
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Duplicate values found for #{field}: #{duplicates.join(', ')}") if duplicates.any?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  existing = Employee.where(field => values).pluck(field)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("#{field.to_s.titleize} already exists: #{existing.join(', ')}") if existing.any?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                def validate_existence!(ids, model_class)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  existing_ids = model_class.where(id: ids).pluck(:id)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  missing_ids = ids - existing_ids
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("#{model_class.name} not found with ids: #{missing_ids.join(', ')}") if missing_ids.any?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                def validate_no_subordinates!(ids)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  managers = Employee.where(id: ids).joins(:subordinates).distinct
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Cannot delete employees with subordinates: #{managers.pluck(:id).join(', ')}") if managers.exists?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                def validate_no_self_management!(employee_ids, manager_id)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Employee cannot be their own manager") if employee_ids.include?(manager_id)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            end

            class BulkOperationService

              class BulkOperationError < StandardError
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                attr_reader :errors
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def initialize(message, errors = [])
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  super(message)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  @errors = errors
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              BATCH_LIMIT = 50
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def initialize(model_class, options = {})
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @model_class = model_class
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @options = options
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @batch_size = options.fetch(:batch_size, 100)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                @validate_all = options.fetch(:validate_all, true)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

              class << self

                def bulk_create(model_class, params, options = {})
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  new(model_class, options).bulk_create(params)

                # Class methods for child services to use
          
      34.

                def validate_limit!(params, limit = BATCH_LIMIT)

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("Batch size exceeds limit of #{limit}") if params.size > limit

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38.

                def validate_presence!(params, fields)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  missing_fields = params.each_with_object([]) do |param, acc|
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    missing = fields.select do |field|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      value = param[field.to_s] || param[field.to_sym]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      value.blank?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    acc.concat(missing) if missing.any?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("Missing required fields: #{missing_fields.uniq.join(', ')}") if missing_fields.any?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                def validate_uniqueness!(params, field)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  values = params.map { |p| p[field.to_s] || p[field.to_sym] }.compact
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  duplicates = values.select { |v| values.count(v) > 1 }.uniq
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("Duplicate values found for #{field}: #{duplicates.join(', ')}") if duplicates.any?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                def validate_existence!(params, field, model_class)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  if params.is_a?(Array) && params.first.is_a?(Hash)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    # For bulk operations with hash params
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    ids = params.map { |p| p[field.to_s] || p[field.to_sym] }.compact
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  else
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    # For simple ID arrays
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    ids = params
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    model_class = field if field.is_a?(Class)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  return if ids.empty?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  existing_ids = model_class.where(id: ids).pluck(:id)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  missing_ids = ids - existing_ids
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("#{model_class.name} not found", { missing_ids: missing_ids }) if missing_ids.any?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def bulk_create(params)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                validate_limit!(params)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                validate_presence!(params, required_fields) if @validate_all
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                validate_uniqueness!(params, unique_fields) if @validate_all && unique_fields.any?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                process_in_transaction do
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  results = { success: [], errors: [] }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  params.each do |param|
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    record = @model_class.new(param)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    if record.save
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      results[:success] << record
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      results[:errors] << { record: param, errors: record.errors.full_messages }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if @validate_all
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  results
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              def bulk_update(params)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                ids = params.map { |p| p['id'] || p[:id] }.compact
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                validate_existence!(ids, @model_class) if @validate_all
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                process_in_transaction do
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  results = { success: [], errors: [] }
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  params.each do |param|
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    id = param['id'] || param[:id]
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      record = @model_class.find(id)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      update_params = param.is_a?(Hash) ? param.except('id', :id) : param
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      if record.update(update_params)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                        results[:success] << record
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        results[:errors] << { record: param, errors: record.errors.full_messages }
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if @validate_all
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      results[:errors] << { record: param, errors: [e.message] }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if @validate_all
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  results
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              def bulk_delete(ids)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                validate_existence!(ids, @model_class) if @validate_all
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                process_in_transaction do
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  results = { success: [], errors: [] }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  ids.each do |id|
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      record = @model_class.find(id)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      if record.destroy
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                        results[:success] << record
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      else
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                        results[:errors] << { record: { id: id }, errors: record.errors.full_messages }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                        raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if @validate_all
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      results[:errors] << { record: { id: id }, errors: [e.message] }
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      raise ActiveRecord::Rollback if @validate_all
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145.

                  results
          
      146.

              end
          
      148.

      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              private
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              def validate_limit!(params)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                raise BulkOperationError.new("Batch size exceeds limit of #{BATCH_LIMIT}") if params.size > BATCH_LIMIT
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              def validate_presence!(params, fields)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                missing_fields = params.each_with_object([]) do |param, acc|
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  missing = fields.select { |field| param[field.to_sym].blank? }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  acc.concat(missing) if missing.any?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                raise BulkOperationError.new("Missing required fields: #{missing_fields.uniq.join(', ')}") if missing_fields.any?
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def validate_uniqueness!(params, fields)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                fields.each do |field|
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  values = params.map { |p| p[field.to_sym] }
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  duplicates = values.select { |v| values.count(v) > 1 }.uniq
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("Duplicate values found for #{field}: #{duplicates.join(', ')}") if duplicates.any?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  existing = @model_class.where(field => values).pluck(field)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationError.new("#{field.to_s.titleize} already exists: #{existing.join(', ')}") if existing.any?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              def validate_existence!(ids, model_class)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                existing_ids = model_class.where(id: ids).pluck(:id)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                missing_ids = ids - existing_ids
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                raise BulkOperationError.new("#{model_class.name} not found with ids: #{missing_ids.join(', ')}") if missing_ids.any?
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def process_in_transaction
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                results = { success: [], errors: [] }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  results = yield
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  if @validate_all && results[:errors].any?
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    # Keep the errors but clear successes since transaction will rollback
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    results[:success] = []
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::Rollback
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                results
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def required_fields
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                presence_fields = @model_class.validators.select { |v| v.is_a?(ActiveRecord::Validations::PresenceValidator) }
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  .flat_map(&:attributes)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  .map(&:to_s)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                # Convert belongs_to association names to foreign key names
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                belongs_to_associations = @model_class.reflect_on_all_associations(:belongs_to)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                belongs_to_associations.each do |association|
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  if presence_fields.include?(association.name.to_s)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    presence_fields.delete(association.name.to_s)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    presence_fields << association.foreign_key.to_s
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                presence_fields
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              def unique_fields
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                @model_class.validators.select { |v| v.is_a?(ActiveRecord::Validations::UniquenessValidator) }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  .flat_map(&:attributes)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  .map(&:to_s)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            end 
          
      217.

    app/services/bulk_position_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    84 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 84 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class BulkPositionService < BulkOperationService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              BATCH_LIMIT = 50
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              REQUIRED_FIELDS = %w[title level department_id].freeze
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                def bulk_create(positions)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(positions, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  validate_presence!(positions, REQUIRED_FIELDS)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  validate_uniqueness!(positions, 'title')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(positions, 'department_id', Department)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(positions, 'parent_position_id', Position) if positions.any? { |p| p['parent_position_id'].present? }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Manual creation with our validation
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  created_positions = []
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    positions.each do |position_params|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      position = Position.create!(position_params)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      created_positions << position
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  created_positions
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                def bulk_update(positions)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(positions, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(positions, 'id', Position)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(positions, 'department_id', Department) if positions.any? { |p| p['department_id'].present? }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  validate_existence!(positions, 'parent_position_id', Position) if positions.any? { |p| p['parent_position_id'].present? }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Manual update with our validation
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  updated_positions = []
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    positions.each do |position_params|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      id = position_params['id'] || position_params[:id]
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      position = Position.find(id)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      update_params = position_params.except('id', :id)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      position.update!(update_params)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      updated_positions << position
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  updated_positions
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end

                def bulk_delete(position_ids)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(position_ids, BATCH_LIMIT)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  positions = Position.where(id: position_ids)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  missing_ids = position_ids - positions.pluck(:id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  unless missing_ids.empty?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Some positions not found", { missing_ids: missing_ids })
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  process_in_transaction(positions) do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    positions.each do |position|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      if position.employees.exists?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new(
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                          "Cannot delete position with employees",
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                          { position_id: position.id }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        )
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      position.destroy!
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    positions.to_a
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65.

                end
          
      66.

                def bulk_transfer(position_ids, new_department_id)

    68. 
            

            

                  validate_limit!(position_ids, BATCH_LIMIT)

    70.

    71.

    72. 
            

            

                  unless missing_ids.empty?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  department = Department.find_by(id: new_department_id)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  unless department
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Department not found", { department_id: new_department_id })
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  process_in_transaction(positions) do

    82. 
            

            

                    positions.each do |position|

    84.

    85.

      87.

                end
          
      88.

                private

                def process_in_transaction(records)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    yield records
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  raise BulkOperationService::BulkOperationError.new("Validation failed", e.record.errors.full_messages)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            end 
          
      100.

                def cache_key_for(resource, identifier = nil)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  key = "#{resource.class.name.underscore}"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  key += ":#{identifier}" if identifier.present?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  key
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

                def cache_key_with_version(resource)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  if resource.is_a?(ApplicationRecord)
          
      11.

                    resource.cache_key_with_version
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    cache_key_for(resource)

                def fetch_performance_summary(employee_id)

                def fetch_department_performance_metrics(department_id)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.fetch("performance:department:#{department_id}", expires_in: 2.hours) do
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    employee_ids = Employee.joins(:position).where(positions: { department_id: department_id }).pluck(:id)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79.

      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      completed_reviews: PerformanceReview.where(employee_id: employee_ids, status: :completed).count,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

                def fetch_goal_analytics(employee_id)

      100.

                def fetch_kpi_dashboard(employee_id, period_months = 3)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.fetch("kpi:dashboard:#{employee_id}:#{period_months}", expires_in: 30.minutes) do
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    period_start = period_months.months.ago
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    kpis = Kpi.for_employee(employee_id).in_period(period_start, Date.current)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    {
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      current_kpis: kpis.current_period.count,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      achievement_percentage: kpis.average('actual_value / target_value * 100')&.round(2) || 0,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      by_status: kpis.group(:status).count,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      by_measurement_unit: kpis.group(:measurement_unit).count,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      trending_data: Kpi.trending_analysis(employee_id, 'Sales Performance', period_months)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  end

                def invalidate_goal_caches(employee_id)

                def fetch(key, expires_in: 1.hour, force: false, &block)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  return yield if force

                  Rails.cache.fetch(normalized_key(key), expires_in: expires_in, &block)

    172. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      173.

                def normalized_key(key)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              392
            

            

                  case key
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  when String, Symbol
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              196
            

            

                    key.to_s
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  when Array
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              196
            

            

                    key.map(&:to_s).join(':')
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  else
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    key.to_s
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            end 
          
      233.

              def self.assign_default_permissions(user)

    4.

              110

              def self.update_manager_permissions(employee)

              def self.update_department_permissions(employee)
